metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8005 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
MediaWiki before 1.23.11, 1.24.x before 1.24.4, and 1.25.x before 1.25.3uses the thumbnail ImageMagick command line argument, which allows remoteattackers to obtain the installation path by reading the metadata of a PNGthumbnail file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8005` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
